methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: provider
params.description: Los proveedores incluyen Libvirt, Ovirt, EC2, Vmware, Openstack, Rackspace, GCE

params.name: user
params.description: Nombre de usuario para oVirt, EC2, VMware, OpenStack. Clave de acceso para EC2.

params.name: password
params.description: Password para oVirt, EC2, VMware, OpenStack. Clave secreta para EC2

params.validator: Must be an array of any type
